question:
B. Complete the sentences below using the past perfect in the negative and the    words provided.
Ex. My house was very dirty when she came over because.... (Il not clean/ for
weeks) My house was very dirty when she came over because I hadn't
cleaned it for weeks.
1. Joe had to study hard for yesterday's test because... (he/not do well/ the week before)
2. I was worried when she didn't arrive on time because... (she/ not be/ late/ before)
3. Judy didn't want to go on the school ski trip because .... (she/not ski/ before)
4. I didn't recognize Ellen at the party because.... (I not/see/ for years)
5. John didn't catch the bus because.... (he/not leave/ the house/ on time​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Lengkapi kalimat di bawah ini dengan menggunakan past perfect dalam bentuk negatif dan the

kata-kata yang disediakan.

Ex. Rumah saya sangat kotor ketika dia datang karena .... (Saya tidak bersih / untuk

minggu) Rumah saya sangat kotor ketika dia datang karena saya tidak

dibersihkan selama berminggu-minggu.

1. Joe harus belajar keras untuk ujian kemarin karena... (dia/tidak mengerjakannya dengan baik/ minggu sebelumnya)

2. Saya khawatir ketika dia tidak datang tepat waktu karena... (dia/ tidak/ terlambat/ sebelumnya)

3. Judy tidak mau ikut perjalanan ski sekolah karena .... (dia/tidak bermain ski/ sebelumnya)

4. Saya tidak mengenali Ellen di pesta karena.... (Saya tidak/melihat/ selama bertahun-tahun)

5. John tidak naik bus karena.... (dia/tidak berangkat/ rumah/ tepat waktu

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu

wer

related_questions.question:
For questions number 18 to 20, Complete the following text with the suitable words.    Mr.Komar is an English teacher. He speak English fluently.
His wife, Mrs. Nani is a(18)......She helps sick people.
She doesn't speak English. Mr.Komar has two children.
They study English not only at school but also at home.
They are(19).....students. Their father teaches them every night,
So they can speak English (20) ......He is very proud of them.
18. a. teacher
b. janitor
c. doctor
d. chef
19. a. lazy
b. proud
c. stupid
d. diligent
20. a. fluently
b. silently
C. slowly
d. badly
This text is for questions number 21 to 23.
My favorite animal is rabbit. Rabit has two longears.
Its eyes are big and black, but when it is dark its eyes are red.
It has two long teeth Its nose is small and soft pink.
Its tail is soft,round and small like a cotton ball. Its legs are small,
It doesn't walk, it jumps It is vegetarian and its favorite food is carrct.
Rabbits are very cute.
21. How many ears does the rabbit have?
a. two ears
c. three ears
b. four ears
d. five ears​

answers.answer:
18. C. Doctor

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas menjelaskan pekerjaan Mrs. Nani yang membantu orang sakit. Jadi, jawabannya adalah (C.)

19. D. Diligent

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan mereka selalu belajar Bahasa Inggris setiap malam dan mereka sangat rajin, Jadi jawabannya adalah (D.)

20. A. Fluently

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan bahwa Mr. Komar sangat bangga dengan anak-anak nya karena bisa berbahasa Inggris dengan lancar. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

21. How many ears does the rabbit have?

: A. Two ears

Penjelasan :

Berdasarkan teks diatas, kelinci adalah binatang favorit sang penulis dan kelinci itu mempunyai 2 telinga. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

Maaf kalau ada yang salah dalam penyampaian kata²nya, apabila ada yang salah dalam jawabannya bisa dikoreksi yaa, semoga membantu ! <3

—Miranthi P.

Read the text and answer questions 6 to 8    It's nice Sunday morning. Hasan's family is doing separate activities. Mr. and Mrs. Hasan are on their bicycles. They
are going to the market groceries Rama the oldest son, is playing guitar in the backyard. The twin daughters, Ami and Irma
are reading a book together in the backyard at the same place the youngest daughter Mona, is drinking a glass of milk.
6.
What are Mr. and Mrs. hasan doing?
A. They are in their backyard
B. They are going to the market
C. They are going to the office
D. They are keeping their child's
7.
8.
What is the twin doing?
A. they are going to the market
B. they are playing guitar
C. they are reading a book together
D. they are drinking a glass of milk
Who is playing a guitar?
A. Hasan's family
B. Mona's Brother
C. Mona's Sister
D. Mona's parent​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

6. B. They are going to the market

7. C. they are reading a book together

8. B. Mona's brother
